title: Carbon Capture in the Black Sea

speakers.name: Peter Krost
speakers.role: Head of Ecology and Aquaculture department
speakers.description: Peter Krost studied Biology, marine ecology, and chemistry at the German universities of Darmstadt and Kiel. He completed his PhD at the IfM (Institut für Meereskunde, today GEOMAR) in Kiel, focusing on the effects of bottom trawl fisheries on sediment biology and chemistry.
